last_episode_to_air.name: Protecting the Family
last_episode_to_air.overview: A Chinese farmer finds out if he's too old for a treatment which could help him grow. Then meet the largest known family of multi-racial dwarfs in the world.

name: Incredibly Small World
overview: This eye-opening series uncovers the extraordinary, surprising and often inspiring lives of people with dwarfism all across the globe. From hidden communities, to outrageous individuals, this series shows what itâ€™s really like to be a little person in a big world.

episodes.name: Keep On Truckin'
episodes.overview: Meet Rob Lillie, who stands just over 4.5 feet tall and dreams of becoming one of America's first dwarf truck drivers.

episodes.name: Hoop Dreams
episodes.overview: Meet Jahmani Swanson, who wants to be taken seriously as a U.S. basketball player and become the first little person to get into the pro league.

episodes.name: O Captain! My Captain!
episodes.overview: Meet Robert Pellerin, who battles the high seas as a lobster fisherman with big dreams of one day captaining his own fleet.

episodes.name: Stand-Up Comic
episodes.overview: A controversial dwarf comedian tries to rise to new heights with his act and a woman in France braves an extreme operation in an attempt to gain the extra height she craves.

episodes.name: David and Goliath
episodes.overview: Meet a dwarf wrestler who takes on a giant to prove his worth. Then travel to a remote dwarf community, whose treatment for dwarfism could hold the key to a treatment for cancer.

episodes.name: Death-Defying Stunt Men
episodes.overview: Meet an Indian dwarf who leaves home to start a new life in a dwarf theatre community and three small brothers who are big names in the Hollywood stunt world.

episodes.name: Ain't My First Rodeo
episodes.overview: See the world's smallest rodeo barrelman take on half-ton raging bulls. Then a community of Filipino dwarfs dream of building a village of their own. And meet a little girl who really is one in a billion.

episodes.name: Protecting the Family
episodes.overview: A Chinese farmer finds out if he's too old for a treatment which could help him grow. Then meet the largest known family of multi-racial dwarfs in the world.
